content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mg5P6fut1Fs

My Checklist for New Businesses (and Entrepreneurs). Answer these questions one-by-one, and you need to be honest with yourself in the comments below.

1. Product – Is it good
2. Price – Is it competitive?
3. Promotion – How will you generate traffic?
4. Perseverance – Can you handle failure?
5. Passion – Do you have it?

If you can say yes to all 5 P’s you will be successful with your business. Financial success doesn’t happen overnight and this might take many years to realize.

I started www.anerdsworld.com 10+ years ago, and in the last couple months, I finally started reaping the financial rewards of my decade of non-stop work.

Chris A. Hughes
Founder of A Nerd’s World[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
